ygData.subject: Re: Finding Pelts
ygData.msgSnippet: The Kelethin, Rivervale, Freeport wolves don t have anything except ruined wolf pelts and Type Wolf pelts, never seen a wolf in Steamfont, only pumas. ...
ygData.messageBody:
The Kelethin, Rivervale, Freeport wolves don't have anything except ruined
wolf pelts and 'Type' Wolf pelts, never seen a wolf in Steamfont, only
pumas.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 1:41 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Finding Pelts


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Thu, 10 Jun 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> I was wondering if any of our loremasters might know where to find Medium
> and High quality wolf pelts. Are they available anywhere outside of
Qeynos
> Hills? Hunting wolves there is very problematic with Holly and that other
> Ranger guy running about.

The wolves tend to get higher level the further you are from
towns (newbie areas). The other areas with low-level wolves
(Rivervale, Freeport, Kelethin, Steamfont?) do not suffer the
Holly problem. Does the Tox Forest (outside Erudin) have
wolves?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
